Used with array_multisort() to sort in descending order

array_change_key_case().description: Changes all keys in an array to lowercase or uppercase

array_combine().description: Creates an array by using one array for keys and another for its values

array_count_values().description: Counts all the values of an array

array_diff_assoc().description: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check

array_diff_key().description: Computes the difference of arrays using keys for comparison

array_diff_uassoc().description: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check which is performed by a user-defined function

array_diff_ukey().description: Computes the difference of arrays using a callback function on the keys for comparison

array_filter().description: Filters elements of an array using a callback function

array_flip().description: Exchanges all keys with their associated values in an array

array_intersect_assoc().description: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check

array_intersect_key().description: Computes the intersection of arrays using keys for comparison

array_intersect_uassoc().description: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares indexes by a callback function

array_intersect_ukey().description: Computes the intersection of arrays using

body: echo 'The 'first' element is in the array';
array_key_exists().description: Checks if the given key or index exists in the array

array_keys().description: Return all the keys or a subset of the keys of an array

array_map().description: Applies a callback function to each element of an array

array_merge_recursive().description: Merge two or more arrays recursively

array_pad().description: Pad an array to a specified length with a value

array_pop().description: Pop the element off the end of the array

array_product().description: Calculate the product of values in an array

array_push().description: Push one or more elements onto the end of an array

array_rand().description: Pick one or more random keys out of an array

body: var_dump(array_reduce($x, 'sum', 'No data to reduce')); // string(17) No data to reduce
array_reduce().description: Iteratively reduce the array to a single value using a callback function

array_reverse().description: Return an array with elements in reverse order

array_search().description: Searches the array for a given value and returns the corresponding key if successful

array_shift().description: Shift an element off the beginning of the array

array_slice().description: Extract a slice of the array

array_splice().description: Remove a portion of the array and replace it with something else

array_sum().description: Calculate the sum of values in an array

array_udiff_assoc().description: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by a callback function

array_udiff_uassoc().description: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by separate callback functions

array_uintersect().description: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data by a callback function

array_uintersect_assoc().description: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by a callback function

array_uintersect_uassoc().description: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by separate callback functions

array_unique().description: Removes duplicate values from an array

array_unshift().description: Prepend one or more elements to the beginning of an array

array_values().description: Return all the values of an array

array_walk().description: Apply a user-defined function to every member of an array

array_walk_recursive().description: Apply a user-defined function recursively to every member of an array

arsort().description: Sort an array in reverse order and maintain index association

asort().description: Sort an array and maintain index association

compact().description: Create an array containing variables and their values

count().description: Count all elements in an array or something in an object

current().description: Return the current element in an array

each().description: Return the current key and value pair from an array and advance the array cursor
